channel.title: Common delta based problems
channel.description: My server is a delta base, and some of the common glitches I need help with, here are some: Well to start the d bow glitch, this glitch happens when your about to attack someone with a dbow you click the spec bar and it hits just like spec would, I need that one cleared up soon please. The next is the sara pots, I want to fix sara brews so they wont subtract any from any lvls. The final glitch is the obby maul glitch, theres a glitch when you put a shield you don't have the def for on, any 2h will be removed and the str bonus wil stay until you remove or add any item. Any help to fix any of these problems would be greatly appreciated, thanks!

item.title: Common delta based problems
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

The obby maul glitch is a problem… It’s something to do with the 2H weilding options…

Read full topic

I’m also trying to fix the obby maul glitch I’m going to check back to see if someone answers so I don’t have to make a topic also.

item.title: Common delta based problems
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

The sara brews is in potions.java, go in there and search for the item ID and you will see something like
skill [5] – 5
Just remove them all.

Read full topic

item.title: Common delta based problems
item.dc:creator: @dds_tw1n dds tw1n
item.description:
@dds_tw1n wrote:

My server is a delta base, and some of the common glitches I need help with, here are some: Well to start the d bow glitch, this glitch happens when your about to attack someone with a dbow you click the spec bar and it hits just like spec would, I need that one cleared up soon please. The next is the sara pots, I want to fix sara brews so they wont subtract any from any lvls. The final glitch is the obby maul glitch, theres a glitch when you put a shield you don’t have the def for on, any 2h will be removed and the str bonus wil stay until you remove or add any item. Any help to fix any of these problems would be greatly appreciated, thanks!
